name.ja: <ruby>熾<rt>し</rt></ruby><ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby>の<ruby>騎<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby>ガイアプロミネンス

text.en:
"Gaia Blaze, the Force of the Sun" + 1 face-up monster you control
When your opponent activates a monster effect in the hand or GY (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 monster; negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that card. When this attacking card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can target 1 FIRE monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Gaia Prominence, the Kindling Seraph" once per turn.

materials: "Gaia Blaze, the Force of the Sun" + 1 face-up monster you control
